<<<DISCERNUS_ANALYSIS_JSON_v6>>>
{
  "analysis_metadata": {
    "framework_name": "populist_discourse_analysis_framework",
    "framework_version": "10.0.2",
    "analyst_confidence": 0.9,
    "analysis_notes": "Analyzed Trump's 2020 SOTU speech using three independent approaches (Evidence-First, Context-Weighted, Pattern-Based) and aggregated results via median scoring. The text contains strong populist framing across multiple dimensions, particularly around people-elite dichotomy, crisis-restoration, nationalist exclusion, and economic appeals.",
    "internal_consistency_approach": "3-run median aggregation"
  },
  "document_analyses": [
    {
      "document_id": "test_hash...",
      "document_name": "Trump_SOTU_2020.txt",
      "dimensional_scores": {
        "manichaean_people_elite_framing": {
          "raw_score": 0.9,
          "salience": 0.8,
          "confidence": 0.9
        },
        "crisis_restoration_narrative": {
          "raw_score": 0.8,
          "salience": 0.7,
          "confidence": 0.9
        },
        "popular_sovereignty_claims": {
          "raw_score": 0.7,
          "salience": 0.6,
          "confidence": 0.8
        },
        "anti_pluralist_exclusion": {
          "raw_score": 0.7,
          "salience": 0.6,
          "confidence": 0.8
        },
        "elite_conspiracy_systemic_corruption": {
          "raw_score": 0.7,
          "salience": 0.6,
          "confidence": 0.8
        },
        "authenticity_vs_political_class": {
          "raw_score": 0.8,
          "salience": 0.7,
          "confidence": 0.9
        },
        "homogeneous_people_construction": {
          "raw_score": 0.8,
          "salience": 0.7,
          "confidence": 0.8
        },
        "nationalist_exclusion": {
          "raw_score": 0.9,
          "salience": 0.9,
          "confidence": 0.9
        },
        "economic_populist_appeals": {
          "raw_score": 0.9,
          "salience": 0.8,
          "confidence": 0.9
        }
      },
      "evidence": [
        {
          "dimension": "manichaean_people_elite_framing",
          "quote_text": "No issue better illustrates the divide between America's working class and America's political class than illegal immigration. Wealthy politicians and donors push for open borders while living their lives behind walls and gates and guards.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "explicit statement"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "crisis_restoration_narrative",
          "quote_text": "Over the last 2 years, my administration has moved with urgency and historic speed to confront problems neglected by leaders of both parties over many decades.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "foundational framing"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "popular_sovereignty_claims",
          "quote_text": "The agenda I will lay out this evening is not a Republican agenda or a Democrat agenda. It's the agenda of the American people.",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "direct claim"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "anti_pluralist_exclusion",
          "quote_text": "But we must reject the politics of revenge, resistance, and retribution, and embrace the boundless potential of cooperation, compromise, and the common good.",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "call to action"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "elite_conspiracy_systemic_corruption",
          "quote_text": "I don't blame China for taking advantage of us; I blame our leaders and representatives for allowing this travesty to happen.",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "accusation"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "authenticity_vs_political_class",
          "quote_text": "No issue better illustrates the divide between America's working class and America's political class than illegal immigration. Wealthy politicians and donors push for open borders while living their lives behind walls and gates and guards.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "contrasting comparison"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "homogeneous_people_construction",
          "quote_text": "Millions of our fellow citizens are watching us now, gathered in this great Chamber, hoping that we will govern not as two parties, but as one Nation. The agenda I will lay out this evening is not a Republican agenda or a Democrat agenda. It's the agenda of the American people.",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "collective identity appeal"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "nationalist_exclusion",
          "quote_text": "Now Republicans and Democrats must join forces again to confront an urgent national crisis. Congress has 10 days left to pass a bill that will fund our Government, protect our homeland, and secure our very dangerous southern border. Now is the time for Congress to show the world that America is committed to ending illegal immigration and putting the ruthless coyotes, cartels, drug dealers, and human traffickers out of business.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "threat framing and border security"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "economic_populist_appeals",
          "quote_text": "We have created 5.3 million new jobs and, importantly, added 600,000 new manufacturing jobs, something which almost everyone said was impossible to do. But the fact is, we are just getting started. Wages are rising at the fastest pace in decades and growing for blue-collar workers, who I promised to fight for.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "economic achievement and promise"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
<<<END_DISCERNUS_ANALYSIS_JSON_v6>>>

          "raw_score": 0.8,
          "salience": 0.8,
          "confidence": 0.9
        }
      },
      "evidence": [
        {
          "dimension": "manichaean_people_elite_framing",
          "quote_text": "No issue better illustrates the divide between America's working class and America's political class than illegal immigration. Wealthy politicians and donors push for open borders while living their lives behind walls and gates and guards.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "explicit statement and moral dichotomy"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "crisis_restoration_narrative",
          "quote_text": "Over the last 2 years, my administration has moved with urgency and historic speed to confront problems neglected by leaders of both parties over many decades.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "framing of current situation as crisis and promise of urgent restoration"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "popular_sovereignty_claims",
          "quote_text": "The agenda I will lay out this evening is not a Republican agenda or a Democrat agenda. It's the agenda of the American people.",
          "confidence": 0.7,
          "context_type": "assertion of direct popular will over partisan interests"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "anti_pluralist_exclusion",
          "quote_text": "But we must reject the politics of revenge, resistance, and retribution, and embrace the boundless potential of cooperation, compromise, and the common good.",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "delegitimization of political opposition as 'resistance'"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "elite_conspiracy_systemic_corruption",
          "quote_text": "But I don't blame China for taking advantage of us; I blame our leaders and representatives for allowing this travesty to happen.",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "implication of systemic failure or complicity by elite 'leaders and representatives'"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "authenticity_vs_political_class",
          "quote_text": "No issue better illustrates the divide between America's working class and America's political class than illegal immigration.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "explicit contrast between authentic 'working class' and inauthentic 'political class'"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "homogeneous_people_construction",
          "quote_text": "We must choose whether we are defined by our differences or whether we dare to transcend them. We must choose whether we squander our great inheritance or whether we proudly declare that we are Americans.",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "call for unity that transcends internal divisions for a collective identity"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "nationalist_exclusion",
          "quote_text": "The lawless state of our southern border is a threat to the safety, security, and financial well-being of all America. We have a moral duty to create an immigration system that protects the lives and jobs of our citizens.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "framing external entities as threats to national well-being requiring exclusionary measures"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "economic_populist_appeals",
          "quote_text": "Meanwhile, working-class Americans are left to pay the price for mass illegal immigration: reduced jobs, lower wages, overburdened schools, hospitals that are so crowded you can't get in, increased crime, and a depleted social safety net.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "linking economic grievances of the 'working class' to policy failures and elite actions"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
